sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Delete Duplicate Report View ACL and Roles for Mobile Offline Result Table, which was created due to backport</description>
        <name>Delete Duplicate Offline Report View ACL</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var aclGR = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');
if (aclGR.get('51ef5b80733110106c1ddb5f24f6a72f') && aclGR.getValue('sys_mod_count') === '1') {
	// if duplicate ACL record hasn't been modified, it should be safe to delete
	// because it was set to inactive when backported
	aclGR.deleteRecord();
	
	// after removing the duplicate ACL, we should remove the ACL Role associated with it as well
	var aclRoleGR = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl_role');
	if (aclRoleGR.get('c15167c0733110106c1ddb5f24f6a76a') && aclRoleGR.getValue('sys_mod_count') === '0') {
		aclRoleGR.deleteRecord();
	}
}

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-06-23 21:49:12</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0e592b055bd85110da168d8fa881c750</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Delete Duplicate Offline Report View ACL</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="SG Offline support" source="com.glide.sg.offline">5cfdf0e03c75311068bcf327dfe37f1f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0e592b055bd85110da168d8fa881c750</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-24 00:03:55</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete Duplicate Offline Report View ACL
